title: Regulation (EEC) No 2113/75 of the Commission of 12 August 1975 amending Regulation No 470/67/EEC as regards the varieties of paddy rice to be taken over by intervention agencies
header:
REGULATION (EEC) No 2113/75 OF THE COMMISSION  of 12 August 1975  amending Regulation No 470/67/EEC as regards the varieties of paddy rice to be taken over by intervention agencies
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES;
main_body:
The table given in Annex I to Regulation No 470/67/EEC is replaced by the following table:
ANNEX I
Corrective amounts
>PIC FILE= "T0007759">   (1)OJ No 174, 31.7.1967, p. 1. (2)OJ No L 72, 20.3.1975, p. 18. (3)OJ No 204, 24.8.1967, p. 8. (4)OJ No L 175, 29.6.1973, p. 32.

The second table in Annex III to Regulation No 470/67/EEC is replaced by the following table:
ANNEX II Basic yield after processing
>PIC FILE= "T0007760">

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 September 1975.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 12 August 1975.
For the Commission
P.J. LARDINOIS
Member of the Commission
